Name: Serendipity (by Jamie Stephenson)
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: MUDDLE blackberries in in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice.
History: Created in 2002 by Jamie Stephenson, Manchester, England.
